description: Detects common NTLM brute force device names
false_positives: Systems with names equal to the spoofed ones used by the brute force tools
name: NTLM Brute Force
query: (winlog.provider_name:"Microsoft\-Windows\-NTLM\/Operational" AND winlog.event_id:"8004" AND source.domain:("Rdesktop" OR "Remmina" OR "Freerdp" OR "Windows7" OR "Windows8" OR "Windows2012" OR "Windows2016" OR "Windows2019"))
author: Jerry Shockley '@jsh0x'
